name: CNPostalAddressFormatter
desc: An object that you use to format a contact's postal addresses.

items.name: func attributedString(from: CNPostalAddress, withDefaultAttributes: [AnyHashable : Any]) -> NSAttributedString
items.desc: Returns a formatted postal address as an attributed string.

items.name: class func attributedString(from: CNPostalAddress, style: CNPostalAddressFormatterStyle, withDefaultAttributes: [AnyHashable : Any]) -> NSAttributedString
items.desc: Returns a postal address as an attributed string and formatted for the specified style.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressPropertyAttribute: String
items.desc: An attribute that identifies the purpose of a range of characters in an attributed string.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressLocalizedPropertyNameAttribute: String
items.desc: An attribute that identifies the localized property of postal address.

items.name: class func string(from: CNPostalAddress, style: CNPostalAddressFormatterStyle) -> String
items.desc: Returns a postal address as a string and formatted for the specified style.

items.name: var style: CNPostalAddressFormatterStyle
items.desc: The style to apply when formatting strings.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressCountryKey: String
items.desc: The country or region name of the address.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressISOCountryCodeKey: String
items.desc: The ISO country code of the address.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressPostalCodeKey: String
items.desc: The postal code of the address.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressStateKey: String
items.desc: The state name of the address.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressStreetKey: String
items.desc: The street name of the address.
